alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:12PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Goshen and north central Laramie Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 811 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Meriden Rest Area, or 31 miles north of Cheyenne, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Goshen and north central Laramie Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
